comment: Last one, please sing He is by Brandy when you do your live tonight
amr:
# ::snt Last one, please sing He is by Brandy when you do your live tonight
(s / sing-01
      :mode imperative
      :polite +
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (m / music
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "He"
                  :op2 "by"
                  :op3 "Brandy"))
      :time (d / do-02
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (l / live)
            :time (d2 / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (n2 / night)
                  :mod (t / today)))
      :ord (o / ordinal-entity
            :value "-1"))
